content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: While discussing as the greedy landlord Peter Schmidt, let's try to push for the highest possible price: 'For this exceptional apartment in the city center, I was initially thinking of [a high price slightly above the market rate] Euros per month. content: As I, Max Müller, hear your proposal, Mr. Schmidt, I appreciate the consideration but must carefully evaluate my budget and options. name: Max Müller from Germany

content: As landlord Peter Schmidt, disappointed but understanding Max Müller's decision, I respond: 'I don't want to continue the negotiation, because unfortunately, my expectations for this prime location were based on the higher rental value.' TERMINATE
